name: From The Ashes (GCRagnarok)
description:
I created this project in Unity as my final major project for my last year at college. The theme was rebirth so I decided to create a character who would turn into a phoenix when they die, allowing additional movement options. The player has a time limit in order to reincarnate themselves otherwise they will receive a traditional game over.

Dev Log - https://sites.google.com/d/1pwfwS7XQkXq-kQitEhSnXsDEXFtggQzZ/p/1sovKNAZi3oRzZ8OpLkH3z8yb0k26XTEJ/edit
